conversations.content: What is the capital of France?
Paris
What is the capital of Germany?
Berlin
What is the capital of Italy?
Rome
What is the capital of Spain?
Madrid

Lisbon
What is the capital of Greece?
Athens

Ankara
What is the capital of Egypt?
Cairo

Pretoria
